description.text: This spell clouds the mind of a humanoid creature with 4 or fewer Hit Dice so that it takes no actions. Humanoids of 5 or more HD are not affected. A dazed subject is not stunned, so attackers get no special advantage against it. After a creature has been dazed by this spell, it is immune to the effects of this spell for 1 minute.

sections.Components: V, S, M (a pinch of wool or similar substance)
sections.Targets: one humanoid creature of 4 HD or less
